The easiest way to get in Slovenj Gradec is with a car. 

There is a railway station in Dravograd (6 mi. North) with daily service to/from Maribor.

2 mi. Southwest of Slovenj Gradec is also a small airport with no regular service, but it is possible to book a private filght with a small aircraft.
There is no public transport service, but there is a Taxi service called Taxi Gral (
On the main street there's a lot of cafes and bars.

In Slovenj Gradec there is one hotel in city centre and one by the airport.
